mention.text: san salvador , 14 nov 89 -- while trying to guarantee the citizens ' security and defend democracy in el salvador , armed forces troops have discovered a safe house of the terrorist groups in san marcos and seized 6 high-caliber rifles , 12,485 rounds of ammunition , 330 pounds of explosives , 16 fragmentation grenades , 1,520 dynamite blasting caps , and 2 radios .
